dcterms:description: OpenAI Gym is a toolkit for developing and comparing reinforcement learning algorithms. It provides a variety of environments to test and benchmark algorithms.
dcterms:title: OpenAI Gym

dcterms:description: The Inverted Pendulum problem is a classic control problem where the objective is to balance a pendulum on a cart by applying forces to the cart.
dcterms:title: Inverted Pendulum

dcterms:creator: G. Brockman
V. Cheung

J. Schneider
J. Schulman

W. Zaremba
dcterms:description: The Cart Pole Balance problem involves balancing a pole on a cart by applying forces to the cart, with the goal of keeping the pole upright.
dcterms:title: Cart Pole Balance
